languages.text: {n}Видение издает каркающий смешок.{/n} "Я есть начало и финал, а также все, что проистекает между ними. Я — глас Истины, которой суждено восторжествовать, ибо к этому триумфу ведут все хитросплетения лабиринтов рока".

{n}The vision lets out a cawing laugh.{/n} "I am the beginning and the end, and all that courses in between. I am the voice of the Truth that is destined to triumph, for this triumph is the terminal point of every twisted maze of fate."
languages.original_text: {n}Видение издает каркающий смешок.{/n} "Я есть начало и финал, а также все, что проистекает между ними. Я — глас Истины, которой суждено восторжествовать, ибо к этому триумфу ведут все хитросплетения лабиринтов рока".

traits.locale_text: {n}A vision of unimaginable vileness appears before your eyes. The flickering image shifts and wavers, as if the azure-feathered creature is constantly changing while still remaining the same. One of its eyes is engulfed in otherworldly fire, the other, a vessel of ancient evil, bores into you. Its voice seems to seep directly into your brain without ever reaching your ears.{/n}

{n}A vision of unimaginable vileness appears before your eyes. The flickering image shifts and wavers, as if the azure-feathered creature is constantly changing while still remaining the same. One of its eyes is engulfed in otherworldly fire, the other, a vessel of ancient evil, bores into you. Its voice seems to seep directly into your brain without ever reaching your ears.{/n}

{n}The vision lets out a cawing laugh.{/n} "I am the beginning and the end, and all that courses in between. I am the voice of the Truth that is destined to triumph, for this triumph is the terminal point of every twisted maze of fate."

{n}The vision lets out a cawing laugh.{/n} "I am the beginning and the end, and all that courses in between. I am the voice of the Truth that is destined to triumph, for this triumph is the terminal point of every twisted maze of fate."

{n}The vision lets out a cawing laugh.{/n} "I am the beginning and the end, and all that courses in between. I am the voice of the Truth that is destined to triumph, for this triumph is the terminal point of every twisted maze of fate."

languages.text: {n}眼前的幻象“嘎嘎”地笑了起来。{/n}“我既是起始，又是终结，还是两者之间的一切。我是注定获得胜利的真理之声，因为这场胜利是命运迷宫的一切终点。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vision lets out a cawing laugh.{/n} "I am the beginning and the end, and all that courses in between. I am the voice of the Truth that is destined to triumph, for this triumph is the terminal point of every twisted maze of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}某种你无法想象的邪恶之物浮现在你的眼前。它仿佛长着天蓝色的羽毛，在你眼前不断闪烁着，似乎一边在不断变化着身姿，一边却又保持着原样。它的一只眼睛被来自另一个世界的烈焰所吞噬，而另一只眼睛，则仿佛容纳着某种古老邪恶之物的容器一样，直接钻进了你的身体。它的声音似乎并没有经过你的耳朵，而是直接渗入了你的大脑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La visión suelta una carcajada que casi parece un graznido.{/n} "Soy el principio, el fin y todo lo que hay en medio. Soy la voz de la Verdad destinada a triunfar, pues cada ruta por el retorcido laberinto del destino conduce a ese triunfo".
languages.original_text: {n}The vision lets out a cawing laugh.{/n} "I am the beginning and the end, and all that courses in between. I am the voice of the Truth that is destined to triumph, for this triumph is the terminal point of every twisted maze of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una visión de una vileza inimaginable aparece ante tus ojos. La imagen titilante muta y ondea como si la criatura de plumas celestes estuviera en cambio constante sin dejar de ser la misma. Uno de sus ojos está envuelto en un fuego sobrenatural, mientras que el otro, el receptáculo de un mal ancestral, te atraviesa. Su voz parece rezumar directamente de tu cerebro, sin pasar por tus oídos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}幻影がけたたましい笑い声を上げる。{/n}「私は始まり、終わり、そしてその間に流れるすべてだ。運命のねじれた迷宮のすべての終着点である勝利を収める運命にある真理の声だ。」
languages.original_text: {n}The vision lets out a cawing laugh.{/n} "I am the beginning and the end, and all that courses in between. I am the voice of the Truth that is destined to triumph, for this triumph is the terminal point of every twisted maze of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}想像を絶する卑劣な光景が目の前に現れる。明滅するイメージは、まるで紺碧の羽を持つ生き物が静止した状態で、常に変化しているかのように揺れている。 その片方の目は異世界の炎に包まれ、もう一方の目は古代の悪の船であなたを直視している。その声は耳に届かずに直接脳に染み込んでいくようだ。{/n}
{n}幻影がけたたましい笑い声を上げる。{/n}「私は始まり、終わり、そしてその間に流れるすべてだ。運命のねじれた迷宮のすべての終着点である勝利を収める運命にある真理の声だ。」

languages.text: {n}La vision laisse échapper un rire rauque.{/n} « Je suis le commencement, la fin et tout ce qui advient entre-temps. Je suis la voix de la Vérité destinée à triompher, car cette ultime victoire est le point final de tous les dédales labyrinthiques de la fatalité. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vision lets out a cawing laugh.{/n} "I am the beginning and the end, and all that courses in between. I am the voice of the Truth that is destined to triumph, for this triumph is the terminal point of every twisted maze of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une vision particulièrement ignoble apparaît devant vous. L'image tremble et oscille, comme si la créature aux plumes azurées changeait constamment, tout en restant la même. L'un de ses yeux est englouti par une flamme surnaturelle, tandis que l'autre, réceptacle d'un mal ancestral, reste fixé sur vous. Sa voix semble s'infiltrer directement dans votre cerveau, sans jamais passer par vos oreilles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Vision stößt ein heiseres, gackerndes Lachen aus.{/n} "Ich bin der Anfang, das Ende und alles, was dazwischen liegt. Ich bin die Stimme der Wahrheit, die triumphieren wird, denn dieser Triumph ist der Endpunkt jedes Schicksalhaften Labyrinths."
languages.original_text: {n}The vision lets out a cawing laugh.{/n} "I am the beginning and the end, and all that courses in between. I am the voice of the Truth that is destined to triumph, for this triumph is the terminal point of every twisted maze of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Vision von unvorstellbarer Schändlichkeit erscheint vor deinen Augen. Das flackernde Bild verschiebt und bewegt sich, als würde sich die Kreatur mit den azurblauen Federn ständig verändern und doch dieselbe bleiben. Eines ihrer Augen ist von außerweltlichem Feuer umgeben, das andere beherbergt etwas uraltes Böses und bohrt sich in dich hinein. Ihre Stimme scheint direkt in dein Gehirn einzudringen, ohne jemals deine Ohren zu erreichen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Silüet, cırtlak bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Ben başlangıcım, sonum, ikisi arasında vuku bulan her şeyim. Galibiyeti mukadder olan Hakikat'in sesiyim. Zira her çarpık kader labirentinin ucu bu galibiyete çıkar."
languages.original_text: {n}The vision lets out a cawing laugh.{/n} "I am the beginning and the end, and all that courses in between. I am the voice of the Truth that is destined to triumph, for this triumph is the terminal point of every twisted maze of fate."

languages.original_text: {n}The vision lets out a cawing laugh.{/n} "I am the beginning and the end, and all that courses in between. I am the voice of the Truth that is destined to triumph, for this triumph is the terminal point of every twisted maze of fate."
